front.title: •Slayn & Korpil Facilities
front.gametext: Deploy on Roche system. Once during each of your deploy phases, you may deploy a starship weapon from Reserve Deck on your B-wing; reshuffle. Also, retrieve 2 Force whenever your starfighter or vehicle 'hits' an opponent's starship or vehicle. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: Based in the Roche Asteroid Field. Worked with Admiral Ackbar to develop the B-wing fighter. Verpine owned, and that means quality.

pulls: A starship weapon on your B-wing
pulledBy: We Wish To Board At Once
